codexFeedback.result: Build stops during the lint step: ESLint can’t resolve the config `next/core-web-vitals` per `.eslintrc.js`. Everything compiles otherwise, but `npm run build` times out because of that failure. You’ll need to add/install the matching ESLint config (usually `eslint-config-next`) or adjust the lint setup before rerunning the build.
